summary: Tested Create Listing 6-step form flow (P0 bug verification). The form is WORKING - Step 1 (Category), Step 2 (Photos) load correctly with full functionality. Navigation between steps works. However, gamification modals (badge celebrations) can intermittently block UI interactions.

minor.issue: Returns 422 when acknowledging milestones - causes badge modal to re-appear
Returns 520 error - real-time messaging not working

ui_bugs.issue: Modal repeatedly appears and can block form interactions. Modal has high z-index that intercepts clicks on form elements

action_items: Fix milestone acknowledgment API (422 error) to prevent badge modals from re-appearing
Add dismiss-on-click-outside functionality to badge celebration modals
Consider adding auto-dismiss timer to celebration modals
critical_code_review_comments: Badge celebration context triggers modals that can block form navigation
The React Native Web TouchableOpacity elements don't have role='button' attribute - may affect accessibility
Multiple console warnings about 'Unexpected text node' in View components
context_for_next_testing_agent: Create Listing form (6-step) is working. Step 1 Category and Step 2 Photos load correctly. The main issue is badge celebration modals that can block interactions. Test Steps 3-6 once photo upload is simulated.

verified_working.step1_category: Category grid loads with 15 categories, subcategories appear on selection
verified_working.step2_photos: Photo upload page loads with Add Photo button and photo tips
verified_working.navigation: Continue and Back buttons functional when not blocked by modal

known_issues.badge_modal_blocking: First Badge and First Listing Unlocked modals appear with confetti and can intercept clicks
known_issues.milestone_api_422: Milestone acknowledgment fails causing modals to potentially re-appear
